content: Investments Savings Stocks Discussion Lifestyle Syfe Asked by AnonymousAsked on 16 Sep 2019Should I wait for DBS digiPortfolio and also invest in Syfe?Hi! I'm currently investing $300/month each to Stashaway and POSB RSP Nikko AM. Should I wait for DBS digiPortfolio and transfer my currently POSB RSP Nikko AM's funds into it? Or get the DBS digiPortfolio (Global) and keep my POSB RSP? Should I also invest into Syfe? Thank you!1 answerAnswerBump0

Grand MasterAnswered on 20 Sep 2019Do read up on Syfe, AutoWealth, StashAway etc.Each one has its own merits.There is a good article by seedly on some of the robo-advisors.It may be a good guide for you. https://blog.seedly.sg/singapore-robo-advisor-investment-comparison/0 comments0
